ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(PriorValue(Status), 'Voided') && NOT(ISNEW()) && NOT(OR($Profile.Name = "System Administrator", $Profile.Name = "Business Admin" ,$Permission.EBH_ContractAdmin)) && NOT( $Setup.ActiveValidationRules__c.All_Validation_Rules_Deactivated__c )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This request is voided please create the new contract request.
